function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of green landscapes and open spaces in apartment housing","Impact":"Reduced well-being, satisfaction, and restorative capabilities for residents","Mitigation":"Incorporating green landscapes, open spaces, and restorative views into apartment housing design","Technologies":"Green building technologies, rooftop gardens, sky gardens, urban green spaces","People":"Residents in urban apartment housing","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, developers"},{"Description":"Increased urban densification and obstructed views","Impact":"Reduced comfort, satisfaction, and well-being for residents","Mitigation":"Managing urban densification, considering apartment housing views and surroundings in the design process","Technologies":"Urban planning strategies, building orientation and design, use of reflective materials for building facades","People":"Residents in densely populated urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, developers"},{"Description":"Changes in privacy and individual space due to COVID-19","Impact":"Altered relationships between individuals, families, and neighborhoods","Mitigation":"Designing apartment housing to accommodate new privacy needs, creating flexible and adaptable spaces for individuals and families","Technologies":"Smart home technology, flexible room dividers, adaptable furniture and living spaces","People":"Residents in apartment housing, families, and neighbors","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, developers"}]}
